name: net8
overview:
We have just started a location service site,Pinpondash. This site is not a location info portal site, but also became a common platform of location service. Because Pinpondash has Web Service API that is to make easy create location service in other website. Pinpondash Web Service API has some useful functions for handling location service. And they are able to be used from other website easily. If you are interested in it, please refer this API manual.

http://pinpondash.com/contents/howtopws_en.html
